attributes.action: Make a public apology to Martha Stewart and allow entry into the UK to promote tourism.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Martha Stewart was banned from entering the UK under the grounds that she has a criminal record. why was Abdullah Al-jabber and Mike Tyson  convicted rapist allowed into the UK?
Positive disrimination from our goverment.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
